reviews.review: Game is addictive and really fun! It has a few bugs and kinks they seem to be working on currently, but it hasn't hindered my enjoyment. I do however think they need to do something to make playing with friends more fun. I wish you could play with friends without it being private only. I do understand why you can't simply let players get points during private matches, especially since people would abuse it, but there has to be better way. Gripes aside, I can totally recommend this game and would probably give a 7 out of ten, maybe an 8 with patches. Depending on your preference, it is at the very least a good slasher holdover until the Friday 13th video game. But what they could do in the future with this premise or with even DLC has me quivering with excitement. Just patch these issues quickly pleezes...
Игра очень классная я сделал предзаказ  Dead by Daylight Deluxe Edition

Ребят привет,сразу скажу игра реально нормальная,а порой даже страшная(особенно когда за тобой бежит маньяк!!!!)Разработчику респект-уважуха,на ноуте пошла на высоких хотя по минимальным системным требованиям ноут не савподает(на 2 gb меньше ОЗУ)Игру рекомендую,но одному играть немного скучно...Играть надо с друзьямиии...Без багов,а так-же жду новых маньяков и персонажей!!!!
güzel oyun, hadi şimdi siktir git.

Did not have very long with the game yet to write a PROPER review. But within the hour ive played so far, I enjoyed myself, and can see further enjoyment with the game. Played a couple rounds as the survivor and as the killer. Each time you play the game changes, bringing all new obstacles to the game. Ive played each killer so far, and two different survivors. My favorite killer so far has to be the wraith killer, the 3rd one added in. Graphics are ok, but at the moment im only using a gtx 550ti, as my 980ti had to be RMA'ed. Game runs smooth, I havent experienced any lag issues yet. Games load realtively quick. All n all so far it seems to be a solid survival game. Its definitely worth the 15$

This game has a lot of potental but in its current state i cant recomend it . The lack of in game voice coms the sheer amount of bugs and the  fact you cant queue with your friends for public games really hurts this game which is a shame because it can be really fun at times
If you really want to buy the game, search on a key selling store because it will cost you less than 5 € (both base game and most DLCs).

Dead by Daylight is an amazing survival game to play solo or with friends. 

It has a few minor inconveniences after release, like not having a party system; but, developers have indicated this will be resolved in the near future. Like any complex survival game of this nature, it's foreseeable that more issues will arise, as it stands the test of time; however, I'm sure people can look forward to these being addressed! 

I would rate this game an 8/10 and can confidently say that the price is worth it!

At about 9:40 PM and I was on my usual nightly walk and decided to take a different path than I usually do and I find myself in this strange area with these meat hooks. I question where I am and what is going on here, then I turn around and I see a 7 foot man standing over me which makes me nearly shit my pants. I bolt away quickly as possible and hide inside of this closet. I peep outside the door and see him walk by creaking the floor. When I see he turns the corner I jump out of the closet and run down to a strange looking engine. Luckily I am skilled with machines so I quickly am able to repair the device. A light turns on above me as the generator goes to full power. What does this strange contraption even do?  I ponder this for a while when a hand grabs my shoulder which makes me shart, luckily it isn't the tall man, it is a girl. She tells me we must escape while we still have a chance. "What even is this place?" I ask her. She opens her mouth to say something and suddenly the 7 foot man is there! He grabs her by the throat and throws her over his shoulder. I don't know what happened after that because I ran as fast as my legs could carry me. I figured whatever happened to her wasn't good because shortly afterwards I heard a brittle scream in the distance. "I have to get out of here!" I said to myself. Frantically I looked around trying to find anything to help me escape this place. Then I remembered the way I came in, surely I can still escape that way! I dash back the way I came and see a large gate blocking my way. I cry in desperation before I see a lever. "This must open the gate" I shout. Madly I pull down the lever, slowly the gate is opening. I turn my head and see the 7 foot tall man coming in my direction. "Hurry up you damned gate!" I yell in desperation. Finally the gate is open, and as I run towards freedom I am grabbed by the back of my neck! His grip is that of steel, I can barely breathe as his hand tightens around my throat. This is the end for me, I know it. Suddenly there is a bright light and the tall man grunts and drops me to the ground. "What the hell was that?" I think to myself. I turn around and see the girl, injured but alive. She nods at me as runs off as the man chases after her in anger. I couldn't believe my luck! I ran outside of the gates and cheered, as I was finally free of the terror thrusted upon me. I will never forget what that girl did for me.

Game is miserable now even with a SWF. Broken perks, broken killer abilities such as 1 shots and map wide teleports, game is zero fun at this point with how OP killers are. On top of this BHVR is a complete joke of a company, allows hackers to run around rampant targeting streamers and normal players alike, then you want to leave the game and you get bans for abandoning the matches unless you are their precious Fog Whisperer. DO NOT SUPPORT THIS GAME OR COMPANY IN ANY WAY

EDIT: You can add dog water servers and disconnects to the list now as well. Lots of reports of people being disconnected mid match and has happened multiple times now to myself.

Atualmente, é um jogo porco e sem balanceamento algum. Os desenvolvedores, mesmo após 6 anos, não têm a mínimo ideia de como deixar o jogo minimamente jogável ou balanceado. A cada update quebram alguma.

Essa porqueira só tá ai até hoje porque foi o primeiro jogo do tipo, já que de qualidade não tem nada.

I played the game in beta before the actual release of the game and that was pretty fun, a shit load of bugs and everything but who really cares, it was beta and it kinda made it more fun and hilarious when playing with friends. Then when the full game was released, i was so excited for it, because in beta you could only play as one of the killers (the trapper). So when i hoped in my very first lobby, people were leaving, then joining, then leaving again. My first thought was that they just wanted to play with their friends, but then another answer poped in my head, they were just disconecting from the server and returning to the main menu because thats what happened to me. Then when i joined and actually played, the killer was a wraith, so i thought "ah ok, i'll just play" but no, the wraith is too OP, they kinda really need to nerf the wraith killer, but overall, when you get a killer who doesn't hook camp, or over abuse the wraith skill, then the game is pretty fun. Also, my opinion is that i have seen some people say that the game would be alot better with a "invite a friend to a public lobby" thing. Well i completely disagree with that, because this game is based around working as a team without people asking for it, if someone is on a hook, its common instinct to help them... But yes you will get those people who will only care about escaping and getting the generators rathing than helping a fallen survivor, but hey, in every game you play you are gonna encounter a few of these people, i guess for me its exciting just to see what kind of teamates you get and what type the killer is.

I recommend this game, but if you are one of those impatiant, "i want everything now" people, well then this probably isnt this kind of game for you at this present point in time.

8/10: Keep up the good work devs

Also remember people, this game not long came out, so gives the devs a break and let them do what they need to do, rather than asking for everything right of the bat.
No party only in private match gayyyyy

One of the best games ive played in a while easily, as a survivor your heart starts racing as soon as the killer starts chasing you until you get away then its the best feeling ever !

As the killer you reign terror on the poor 4 sobs trying to escape, simple but not so simple at the same time, is to kill them any means necessary!! 

10/10 for me

STOP READING AND BUY IT! ITS CHEAP FOR THE FUN YOULL GET OUT OF IT. STOP LETTING THE NEGATIVE PEOPLE SUCK ALL THE FUN OUT OF GAMES!!!

This game is incredibly addictive! And its hard for me to keep coming back to a game.. I usally play a game a few times before I get udderly bored with it but thats not the case with DBDL! I love it. For the price of 18.00 its worth every penny! I just cant beilieve how many people gripe and moan about little things.. Just goes to show and you cant trust fellow gamers reveiws as alot of them go in to a game with the attitude of looking for something thats gonna suck.. 

I went into this game fresh (I didnt look up review or gameplay videoes) I did it the old fashioned way and just bought it and tried it out. Its simply amazing how little indie games like this are so fun but alot of AAA titles just get old after a few hours. This genre is really a fresh idea instead of the rinse and repreat ideas of other titles. Oh and I havent noticed any bugs in the game in the 50 hours ive played it.. not one! It might have some but im just saying i havent noticed any. 

People are also complaining about no mics or sidechat in actual gameplay........... are you serious? this isnt that kind of game.. sidechat would ruin/make it less intense.  One flaw in this game that no one  else mentions? is the loooooooong que for the killer... Every single time i make a killer lobby its about 50 minutes to an hour and half waiting time which insane.. the devs need to fix this instead of working on small details like the vault jump.
This games takes "tactic" to a whole new level!
chchch ahahah
Fun game playing with friends. Just need to add a party system.

         С чего ради я не могу восполнять свой арсинал, если дорогие, горечё всеми любимые нами разработчики, любезно 
         их раскидали в каждом шкафу, С пожеланием - НЕ СТЕСНЯЙСЯ, что ты, как не родной, бери сколько душе угодно.
      Б) ТРАПЕР ХЕРОВ БЕЗ КАПКАНОВ ТЫ ЧМО ПОЛНОЕ, вечно я об них спотыкаюсь - всё ты виновен.
          НУ И Т.Д. ТАКАЯ ЖЕ ХЕРЬ КО ВСЕМ МАНЬЯКАМ В ЭТОМ БЫДЛО СООБЩЕСТВЕ, ШКОЛОЖАБ. 
          У КОТОРЫХ В СПИСКЕ ИГР ЗНАЧИТСЯ ЛИШЬ ОДНА КОНТРА.
          Я СМОТРЮ МОЗГ НА БОЛЬШЕЕ НЕ СПОСОБЕН, 
         КРОМЕ, КАК ИЗО ДНЯ В ДЕНЬ ПОДПУЛИВАТЬ ЧЬИ - ТО  ЖОПКИ)) 
             У 50% ЭТОГО ЭКСКРИМЕНТА СТОИТ БАН ЗА ИСПОЛЬЗОВАНИЕ ЧИТОВ. 
            Пошли в знатоки хреновы,))

Anfangs, als das Spiel gerade raus war, habe ich es geliebt! Theoretisch ist es das auch immernoch. Allerdings...
... das Balancing ist noch sehr schlecht!

... Der Killer ist von den Überlebenden nicht zu sehen. Man weiß also nie ob der einen hohen Rang hat oder ein neuling ist. Er hingegen sieht die Überlebenden schon in der lobby und kann dann einfach die Lobby verlassen wenn ihm die Überlebenden zu stark sind, was scheinbar auch ganz typisch ist. Das ist dann nochmal ärgerlicher wenn man zum nächsten Punkt kommt.

... gibt es seit "kurzem" die Möglichkeit zusammen mit Freunden gegen einen Killer zu spielen. Die Option wurde eingebaut um sie dann 12 Std. danach wieder zu entfernen weil sie nicht funktioniert hat. Das war ärgerlich weil sich viele darauf gefreut haben. Dann wurde sie einige Zeit später wieder hinzugefügt und nun klickt man auf Bereit er sucht, er findet kein spiel und man klickt wieder bereit. Hat man dann nach 20 min endlich ein spiel gefunden verlässt ggf. der Killer das Spiel wie schon beschrieben. Dann fällt man zurück, ganz allein in eine Lobby und man darf alle Freunde neu einladen und das ganze spiel wieder von vorn beginnen. Auf einen Fix warten wir schon lange... 

Was man aber dazu sagen muss: Spielt man das Spiel ganz allein ist die Lobby suche nicht perfekt aber funktioniert besser und das Spiel an sich ist echt schön aufgebaut. Es steckt viel Liebe zum Detail in den Maps und die Umgebung und Sounds sind wirklich super! Es kommt echt horror stimmung finde ich.

Also wer das Spiel alein spielen will, kann es ruhig kaufen, aber um mit Freunden und Bekannten zu spielen lasst es sein, ihr ärgert euch tot!

Daher gibt es aktuell einen Daumen runter, sehr schade für ein eigentlich sehr gutes Spiel!
This game is not as good as it could be, lacks party lobbies and in a co-op game this results in a lacking game. wouldnt buy untill this is put in  !

My review will Stay Positive, Because I spent too much time on this game for me to make it negative, and this game is worth it. I definetly recommend it. 

But some things need fixed. It's obvious. I don't believe this game is eactly where the devs want it to be. And I believe they are trying to fix it. 

There are problems. More than 4 times now, as the killer I have clipped out of the map picking up a victim, and more than three times I have have frozen completely in place pulling them out of windows.

Also, the ranking system is maddening. if you don't win 10 thousand points every single match, you don't rank up. and sometimes the amount of points you score is not dependent on your skill. if even one victim leaves the game before you kill them, you can effectively kiss having more than 10 thousand points on that round goodbye. 

Subsequently, the scoring system for the survivors is way too harsh in my opinion.  I can activate two generators on my own, and another while cooperating, save someone from a hook, not get touched by the killer one time, and escape perfectly, and MAYBE make it out with 10 thousand points. The faster you win, the less points you recieve, which is amazingly stupid. You are punished for having a perfect and quick round. 

Lastly, and possibly the worst, People constantly leave the lobbies to find their friends. Two things can fix this. a cap on how many matches you are allowed to leave in a 24 hour period / severe consequences for leaving a lobby for no reason, or make a party system.  People want a party party system, Which Frankly I do not want. It's a detriment to the Killer when the victims can talk to eachother on skype while they're playing, even if they're on exact opposite sides of the map.

So add a party or don't, I don't care, but people constantly leaving one after another to find their friends is infuriating. And I think it ridiculous that more than three quarters of the negative reviews  on this game are because a party option isn't available. this game deserves more than just "mostly positive"

This game is great. being a killer is action packed and intense, being a survivor is heart pounding and fun. If you were a fan of evolve, or are a fan of horror, or action, or anything in between, do yourself a favor and buy this game.
Awesome asymmetrical game!
Игра отличная, но вопрос можно ли использовать ключи на бету за делюкс издание сейчас (после релиза)?
A new take on pvp. Really fun as both a survivor and a killer.

Ve hře je 5 hráčů, 4 přeživší a 1 vrah. Přeživší musí nahodit 6 generátorů a vrah je musí obětovat dřív, než přeživší opraví všech 6 generátorů a utečou přes bránu ( ve hře jsou 2 brány ) a nebo když přežil jenom jeden, tak může použít poklop na zemi kterým uteče hned a nemusí opravovat ostatní generátory. Vrah nezabijí tím, že přeživší zabije na místě, vrah musí 2x zasáhnout hráče aby přeživšího zranil a složil na zem. Přeživší můžou využívat okolí, takže mohou přeskakovat překážky mnohem rychleji než vrah, nebo se schovat do skříně, a nebo shodit blokádu aby jste zpomalily vraha. Vrah není jeden, ale je jich několik, a určitě ještě přibidou, každý má jinnou speciální schopnost a perky. A ted už odbočím od popisu účelu hry a přejdu k mému hodnocení, mě osobně hra strašně baví, ale jelikož to je týden venku, má to několik chybiček a někdy se může stát, že vas taková chybička hodně naštve. Časem to určitě bude lepší, ti lidi co mají rádi kooperaci s týmem a taky trochu nervů u horrorové hry, tak doporučuju. prozatím promě tahle hra je 9/10 jen kůli pár bugů v lobby :D
Well done with few bugs, worth the price you pay if you like games to tease and stress your mind and heart!

*The original review is lower down*

13-09-2017: The game is now much more stable in terms of grind and playthrough, and with the shrine system it makes it easier for players to get an upper hand if they get the needed gems, it's once again worth a buy.

AS OF 1.1.0:
The developers keep pushing onward in polishing their game and giving it a proper shine, and even granted us a FREE DLC for The Nurse and Nea characters, there's a lot I like about how the game is right now, from playing and customizing your own characters with a good assortment of perks, and now includingly one that shows the entire team if someone is being a Lazy susan and isn't trying to help unhook someone.
HOWEVER I will now touch PERSISTING PROBLEMS:
1- The matchmaking is still just "Press Join" and await for an open room, and hoping you get one without lag.
2- The GRINDING. Oh boy, bittersweet word that may be, grinding is now harder in the game and even more so it feels very slow the higher levels you reach, it'll take you nearly a month if not a "cave-dweller" to get 3 characters all to level 30, wich is in the game truly starts taking a new shape, so far I feel there should be timed boosters during the weekends or during certain weeks, and these could be announced, therefore dragging more players back into playing 'cause "Oh shit, I get TRIPLE the points!?", or at the very least, let us risk BUYING Blood Point boosters as DLC, there isn't much wrong to it, the game is still played and whoever levels faster will eventually land with players of either equal skill or levels, offer a mask or something with it just as an excuse, Payday 2 did it for a good while and people ended up enjoying a good handful of the DLC's, even when they just added more cosmetics and minor accessory tweaks.

For short: the game continues to deliver good times, but it does go from a nicely paced jog to a slog and crawl through the later parts of it. I think something like the timed "à la MGS: V" BP boosts or  "Shark Card" DLC's could be beneficial!
 

( Original Review written in version 1.0.1)

The survivors are granted more chances of succeeding than a killer, over the fact you can vault windowsills without these being on a cooldown, like for example if the window came down and prevented that hole to be used, or the fact since the killer cant climb over chest high obstacles, a survivor can theoretically run around a tank tread in the farmstead per say, indefinitely, thus turning what could be an interesting chase, into a joke, this isn't me being salty, it's seeing a proof of read actually being applied in the game itself.
The game is good so far, it's VERY cathartic to be able to overcome odds in this game, but as it stands, the survivors are of 1.0.1 have the upper hand, but am looking forward to further balances in the next updates.

ONE. STRONG. POINT I WILL TOUCH. The game has people abusing already of things such as speed hacks (this luckily so far being rare, you'll mostly find foreign eastern players doing this), they're not unkillable, just, they jitter around constantly, so play it smart and there WILL BE  a good time to get them. Death first and foremost to these sacks of S.h.i.t. but what can you do really?
If you find any of these people, report them at your leisure.
We do not support lying Devs who use their game to fund NFTs

Great game

The Good: Great party game with your friends. With VoIP to actually communicate with your team or taunt the survivors it can create some of the most hand shaking tension I've had in a multiplayer game.  All the killers feel unique with their specials and surviving feels like an accomplishment.

The Bad: The bugs. Oh my god is this game a buggy mess for a finished game.  It feels like the beta didn't really accomplish much in terms of bug testing. Also some new objectives would be nice other than "Fix Generators, open one or both the doors, escape" A small gripe to be sure, but something to consider.

The Ugly: You don't earn Blood Points in private matches. I can understand ranks, but I want to play this game with my friends, but I'm forced to play in public matches to level up my characters for perks. The ranking system also seems majorly borked since getting 3 of 5 generators, saving 2 people off hooks, multiple escapes from the killer and surviving doesn't get me a pip of rank. I mean surviving for the first few ranks should get you a pip. Oh and manage to survive but don't earn a pip? Guess what, you lose one. Possibly your items as well as punishment.

Overall, it's a fun game with some great potential provided the Dev's listen to the community and fix some of these glaring oversights/Bugs. We want some kind of communication with the group. Even proximity based VoIP or some kind of quick emotes would do SO much in communicating.  This game (to me) is in the same vein as L4D or Payday. Groups of friends playing together on a constant basis. Don't make us forced to pub to earn stuff.

Simple yet fun. As a survivor, you attempt to escape by searching for multiple generators followed by an exit. As the killer, you hunt for survivors to end their days. The only flaw with this game is the fact that you cannot play with a friend in an open lobby. You can only play with friends in a closed lobby - please do fix this as this is a primary reason as to why many people were interested from the start.

Definitely worth it at its current price, 17.99 USD. I don't even like horror games, but this is an exception.

I pre ordered this game, and I was excited. First day, it was fucking amazing, then they introduce a patch. I'm thinking, oh yay, a few bugs I have never seen fixed. Next thing you know I'm glitched in front of a closed cabinet while the survivors power up the generators around me, because a downed guy went in the corner next to the cabinet. Not worth the money yet.

after 350 hours i still kinda suck, but got damn this game is fun.


edit: 500 hours....

1-st rang(killer) - playing for the killer without facecamp...

This game has some kinks at launch, and the devs have addressed and started fixing these issues. One thing that people seem to be complaining about is the fact there is no party system at launch, the devs addressed that it would be coming out soon after launch once it is ready. DO BUY THIS GAME, it may not be perfect at launch, but supporting the devs that will continue updating this game and giving it more content is something people need to do. This game is extremely fun and immersive. Playing as both killer and survivor I have found that other survivors do tend to help others out instead of going it alone. The balance between most killers and survivors is actually pretty dead on at launch. The Hill Billy seems to need a buff, but I'm not sure if I think that just because of the ones I have played with. My personal favorite has always been Wraith

TL;DR This game is good, Buy it, support the devs, PLAY WITH FRIENDS IS COMING VERY SOON JUST BE PATIENT FOR ONCE.
Despite the bugs, this game is awesome! Especially if you have friends to play it while over Teamspeak or some other voip program!

fun and enjoyable game yet key multiplayer features such as public parties have not been added. at this moment the only way you are able to play with friends is only in the case of a private party in which atleast 5 of your friends must own the game. I understand this game has just been released but this seems like a pretty key component for this type of game.

Excellent Game!

First and foremost this is a stressful, frenetic, hide and seek game... and depending on what side you play on, the game play varies greatly. 

Survivors feel very balanced, and through very, very good teamwork (and luck) a survivor can be able to escape. However, as the Killer you feel extremely powerful. Like a game of cat and mouse, there were many times I toyed with the survivors, like letting them free each other and just having fun with them. 

The graphics/animations aren't the best but always getting better and the environments are dark, creepy, and evil. The sounds are well done also, from the grass crumpling under your feet or a twig snapping as you brush by, to the grunts of pain when hiding or the screams of the survivors as you throw them onto a hook. 

Now, although there are people who can ruin the experience by disconnecting, or by abusing cheesy mechanics, don't let it deter you from playing an excellent game. The progression feels meaty, as it will take a bit of time to level with a specific survivor/killer completely. 

For me, this game is a 9/10! Absolutely love it!

This game is the game i've always wanted as a horror fan. Although the Friday the 13th game is coming out and does look much better. This game has the potential to do so much more. Right at the moment there are 3 Monsters to choose from. I hope they release more in patches. I had encountered several bugs which has caused cheap deaths. It's a 4 vs 1 multiplayer slasher surivial horror game. 4 survivors go around and work on generators by clicking M1. A meter fills slowly and at moment the generators kick back which you have a prompt to press the space bar at the correct moment. If you fail it kicks back and it alerts the Slasher/Monster and believe me he is coming. You must work as a team, find one another, and turn on enough generators to escape the monster. You gain Xp/points for each action almost. You use those in a blood web and unlock new items that are usually one time use and you can buy them back with more blood points. You will usually will get enough points to get one upgrade even if you lose the match. I am having fun with it so far and as long as the content keeps coming then this game will be around for a while. Well at least until Friday the 13th comes out.

THE GOOD
- Awesome concept, fantastically executed.
- Remains interesting after a few hours, I was worried about the gameplay becoming boring and repetitive. This is salvaged by an interesting leveling up system known as 'The Bloodweb'
- Tense and scary; everything you want from a horror game. The initial 'scare' factor does fade once you've played it enough, but the constant feel of dread does not
- Loved and nurtured.. there's a beautiful finish to this game. It has been cared for, and this is evident in the characters and their individual abilities, the maps and the offerings to The Entitiy.

THE BAD
- Connection issues.. constantly experiencing weird issues such as being kicked out of lobbies. I'm sure this will be improved, however the first patch seems to have only focused on graphical glitches.
- THE WRAITH. Words cannot describe.. ever played Evolve? How much do you hate The Wraith in that? This is quite similar.. overpowered and therefore unbalanced; a game is in no way enjoyable ifyou know it is unwinnable. The second I hear that bell my enjoyment goes out the window; what could be a tense and interesting match has instantly been turned into a silly and useless game against one hell of an overpowered killer! Please rethink him and update! I'm all for a challenge, but this is beyond that!

В игру уже можно играть,но покупать советую только по скидке,ибо 400 рублей игра явно на данный момент не стоит,а вот за 300 стоит брать.
Краткий обзор:

Механика +

Геймплей +

Звуки и музыка +- Теперь это и минус и плюс,потому что тема из фильма Halloween конечно же неплоха,но нельзя просто так взять и впихнуть музыку 1978 года в игру 2016,потому что в игре музыка более современная и не подходит под музыку фильма. Это тоже самое,как соеденить в одной игре Брандербургский концерт И.C. Баха и Personal Jesus группы Depeche Mode,музыка отличная,но вместе никак не слушается.

Оптимизация (стала чуть лучше с моего последнего обзора,но жрать 2 гига видеопамяти... Total War Rome 2 жрет столько при осадах 5000 VS 5000,а тут,да при таком графоне...).
Время на сбор команды (вылеты из лобби пофиксили,но за маньяка вы будете очень долго ждать пока соберутся выжившие,иногда по 20 минут ждал) -

Плюсов больше,но если видюха слабая лучше не брать,на средних настройках игра после последних патчей выдает 60 фпс,но загружает видеокарту (ASUS R9 270) по полной. Я,конечно,понимаю,что видюха не топовая,но и с такой то графикой аля 2011 год можно было и оптимизацию на уровне сделать.
Подводя итог: уже можно играть.
           P.S. Мнения насчет последнего обновления разошлись,я лишь приведу свою статистику из 20 матчей,сыгранных за выжившего,новый маньяк попался 17 раз(1 раз хиллбилли и 2 раза трапер),новый маньяк победил нас 16 раз(мы выйграли лишь тогда,когда нам попался рак,который не умел использовать способности),а из старых меня один раз убил трапер и то,все остальные сбежали. Вывод делайте сами,и да,я рак(ну нет,серьезно).

REMEMBER THIS IS STILL ALPHA! So there's a lot of potential in this game as I have seen for the past few days.
This is one of those scary games where you can still have fun playing by yourself and with friends. Although there are still bugs (PATCHED as of June 17)*** that I have experienced during gameplay, it's a wonderful game to purchase at $18 before July 4th. It's a game worth purchasing as DEVs are working on patching and adding new content to the game.
I just hope that they will add in features where I can party with Friends and be working together in a game rather then trying to lobby with them (for hours on end..., but there was that one time where we did and it was so much fun)
Also, add on a mic option to talk to either teammates or even on lobby. It would be cool if DEVs add a mic option where we can actually talk like 'whisper' in the gameplay so it adds the surreal of the environment that we are in or something.

Other than that, this game is fun for me and has many potential in it. I'll be waiting for new updates on the game!!! Cheers!

Nah.

Dieses Spiel macht unglaublich viel Spaß.
Es ist wahr, dass es noch ein paar Unstimmigkeiten gibt und es ist recht ärgerlich, dass man noch nicht mit einem Freund eine öffentliche Lobby joinen kann ... Aber ich finde, deswegen macht es nicht weniger Spaß.
Man liest in den Foren von vielen Problemen, allerdings kann ich sagen, dass ich persönlich bisher kaum Bugs oder ähnliches erlebt habe.

Zum Spiel an sich: Das Konzept ist klar, man kann entweder einen von 4 Überlebenden spielen, die versuchen einem unbarmherzigen Killer  zu entkommen. Oder man spielt eben diesen Killer (man kann aus 3 spielbaren Killern wählen. Als Überlebender muss man fliehen indem man Generatoren repariert, welche dann die Ausgangstore mit Strom versorgen ... natürlich muss man als Killer die Flucht der potenziellen Opfer verhindern und das funktioniert hervorragnd, wenn man sie  quer über die Map jagd und dann auf rostige Fleischerhaken hängt, die zufällig in der Gegend rumstehen ;)
Es gibt ein Levelsystem sowohl für die Überlebenden als auch für die Killer und ich persönlich bin mit der Gestaltung dieses Systems zufrieden. 

Das Spiel ist spannend und ziemlich nervenaufreibend als  Überlebender und als Killer ;)
Die Gestaltung der verschidenen Maps gefällt mir persönlich gut und die Soundkulisse ist ziemlich atmossphärisch.
Kurz gesagt, ich kann das Spiel jedem empfehlen, der diese Art von Spiel mag und Lust auf eine Menge Nervenkitzel hat und den es nicht stört, dass es noch ein paar Problemchen gibt (man muss ja sagen, dass die Entwickler da ziemlich hinterher sind, erst heute kam ein Patch raus). 

Kurz gesagt, ich persönlich liebe dieses Spiel und finde es ist sein Geld auf jeden Fall wert ♥

If you thought Fallout 3 was buggy when it came out then think again. This game truly takes the price, buggies game of the year. The game is literally exactly the same as the beta version, the only thing that is "different" is that they have added some more stuff. However when it went from beta to "complete game" they didn't fix any bugs nor glitchs what so ever. 
Oh yeah, lets not forget, there's like what, 2 or 3 maps...

As a killer you have literally no way of knowing where the generators get fixed unless they blow up...at which point people have ran away already and the killer, well, all killers are slow like some old granny...

The animations are very simple and the game gets very repetative after an hour or two.

If I were you I would wait for an update or at least a -50% sale. 

TLDR - Alpha game released as "full game".
So much awesome experiencem its so worth it!

На первый взгляд игра очень даже хороша , не обращая внимания на то , что раза с 5го ты присоединишься к лобби , бывает и из него выкидывает (но думаю скоро исправят... наверное...) . Игра длиться примерно 4-15 минут , что есть хорошо! Не придеться заниматься долгим фармом. Для меня главный минус в том , что уж больно однообразная игра думаю надоест часов через 7-10. на 3-4 вечера точно скоротит.
В общем 7 крюков из 10 генераторов.

Okay so this game has some serious bugs but it also has to be one of my favorites its really good but has some glitchs

Pros:
Good gameplay
Nice graphics
Fun, edgy, ETC
Gives you an adrenaline rush
Good co-op

Cons:
Glitchy
Disconnects you in the middle of rounds sometimes (and this also causes you to lose ad-ons like medkits)
Occasional lag
Stressful
Bad lobby system (matchmaking)
Hard to play with friends

Conclusion:
If you have the patience and you love to be on the edge of your seat, then this game is for you. Other than a few technical problems, the game is excellent and has a lot of potential. I recommend it to people with patience. If youre not very patient, youll probably refund it soon after purchase.

DbD is a very fun and exciting game that is extremely well balanced despite the relatively short beta and whiny playerbase. The game can be extremely unforgiving to newbies but that will motivate you to get better, at least it did for me. You will not be great at it from the get-go. There are a few bugs here and there but this game is fresh off the boat and I have no doubt that every legitimate problem will be addressed. I hope that the devs don't cave to the rage-quitters. I've played mostly survivor since launch (as most people are queueing up to be killers, creating a small wait time to be one) and I've found that there's a fair and balanced strategy to counter every killer. Sometimes there's no getting away and that's just the "luck" aspect of the game. Playing as a killer can be just as challenging and each has its own separate avenues for advantages. I highly recommend you check it out.
No party system so dont expect playing with your friends unless you wanna play in a private game.

This is a very well made game. Though it has, in its earliest stage, lots of glitches and bugs. This is forgivable only because it came out a few days ago. I feel like the killer, the Wraith, is overpowered, because it can move so fast and the only things that give it away is the very hard to see patches of body and weird grunting it makes. I don't like the fact the add-ons only last for one round, i think they should last at least 2 or maybe more rounds. Other than that the game is pretty good. The character progression is great and the gameplay is mostly smooth. I would recommend this game to more advanced player who can easily make it over the learning curve that comes with this game.

Repair The Generators, Find and Gather traps to kill the hunter etc. Just some different modes instead of the same repair the generators.

If you like hitting your dirty cleaver on those poor whimpering "survivors" and then hang them on a hook for you to stare at in pride, then this game is for you. Sad that the victim gets eaten by a giant weird spider though, but it's necessary.

If you like playing with and teasing a phychokiller by jumping through windows and slamming wooden boards in his face, this is the game for you. And if it all gets on your nerves too much, just open the damn door.

In all honesty, this game is addicting. No matter what role you choose. 

In my opinion though, they should have kept it in BETA for a while longer. There are some baby issues right now, such as not being able to change in game controls without making a script yourself, or some random bugs that they could have known in those few days it actually was in BETA. They promised us some things for release, they did not finish their work in time. 
For now, I trust that the developers will be able to fix their stuff with a little time. That the game is addicting already, says something about what it can grow into.

Overall, positive, with hope of improvement.
